thread.title: Jays announce start times for first playoff games
thread.title_full: Blue Jays announce start times for first playoff games | Toronto Star

author: thestar.com
title: Jays announce start times for first playoff games
text:
Better get those time-off work requests in quickly, Blue Jays fans.
On Twitter , the Jays announced start times for their opening playoff games against the Texas Rangers at the Rogers Centre this Thursday and Friday.
In Game 1 of the series on Thursday, the Jays will play at 3:37 p.m. if the Houston Astros win the wildcard playoff or at 4:07 p.m. if the Yankees get through.
The second game on Friday will take place at 12:45 p.m.
On the Jays website, it also lists 8 p.m. Sunday as the time for Game 3, which will take place in Texas.
